info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-nmsp-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for wireless nmsp operational data.
     Copyright (c) 2016-2019, 2022 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Wireless
**Paths:** 11
